comments: Wrote an unpublished Ph.D. thesis in 1966, A revision of the genus Gleditsia (Leguminosae) which was also referred to in Mem. New York Bot. Gard., 25(2): 214 (1975).
examples: Gleditsia microphylla D.A.Gordon ex Y.T.Lee in J. Arnold Arbor. 57(1): 29 (1976)
source: Publ. cited below, see also p. 31.  First name from Taxon, 19: 919 (1970).
